attributes.action: make sanitary towels free to all women
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: i find it very hard to believe that in this day and age,women still have to pay for sanitary towels. contraceptives can be obtained free of charge from family planning clinics, but this does not mean that people have to have intercourse, yet women upto a certain age cannot help going through a menstrual cycle every month, i wonder if men had to endure this whether some sort of act would have been past years ago.
